set.reason: Survived ranged combat with Skeleton Archer using Evasion procs and Pattern Recognition.

persona_updates: Artie is gaining confidence in his ability to survive the System's lethality by treating combat as a data-entry problem.

chapter_so_far_add: Artie successfully kited a Skeleton Archer in the crypts, validating his high-evasion strategy and Pattern Recognition skill.
key_events: Artie encountered a Level 4 Skeleton Archer in the Low-Level Crypts.
The Cloak of the Cowardly Lion triggered an Evasion Proc to avoid the first arrow.
Artie used Pattern Recognition (Rank G) to identify the archer's 120-BPM attack script.
Artie successfully dodged subsequent arrows by timing his movements to the 'upbeat'.
Artie's stamina decreased to 64/100 during the encounter.
The Skeleton Archer exhausted its quiver, rendering it unable to attack.
last_scene: Artie faced a Skeleton Archer in the Low-Level Crypts, testing the Cloak of the Cowardly Lion's evasion capabilities.
Through a combination of automated evasion procs and his own Pattern Recognition skill, he dodged a series of lethal arrows.
The encounter concluded with the archer running out of ammunition, leaving Artie unharmed and increasingly confident in his tactical exploits.
